properties.entry: select a.docId, j.judgement_id, 1, a.disease from i2b2_2008_anno a /* limit to training set */ inner join i2b2_2008_doc doc on doc.docId = a.docId and doc.documentSet = 'train' inner join i2b2_2008_judgement j on j.judgement = a.judgement where a.source = 'intuitive'

select docId, covered_text, 1 from ( select distinct d.docId, lower(covered_text) covered_text from i2b2_2008_doc d inner join i2b2_2008_anno a on a.docId = d.docId and a.source = 'intuitive' and a.disease = :label /* get ytex document */ inner join document yd on yd.uid = d.docId and yd.analysis_batch = 'i2b2.2008' /* get words in document */ inner join anno_base ab on ab.document_id = yd.document_id and ab.uima_type_id = 26 where d.documentSet = 'train' and covered_text is not null ) s
